name: Soledad (GiganteLND)
description:
You found yourself in the ruins of a fallen kingdom inhabited by vengeful spirits of battles of the past, you must collect the orbs of souls and escape in time.

Soledad (Sole as in Solemn and dad as in Dad) is a chase/time attack first person game, where you must collect orbs and make it to the exit while being chased by the ghosts of the past of a long forgotten kingdom.

Controls: WASD To move, shift or right bumper to run.
